extendedInfo.description: Please watch Demo Video before purchase.Teach your phone to say whatever you want it to say. Please read section â-Teaching your phone to say stuff:â to learn more.-DescriptionFirst time when you start the app, It will load a default brain into your phone SDCard.Basically this default brain will say something when you say something.--Default brain details.---Basics Examples :    If you say : how are you    The Phone will say back : I am good how are you doing, what are your plans today     Default words it knows before you teach it more words are âhow are       youâ,âhelloâ,ânameâ,âdogâ,âcatâ.-LookUp Examples : You can also lookup stuff by saying the key word âlookupâ before you say anything else.you can say"look up Italian restaurants""look up movies"âlook up weatherâlook up local moviesââlook up phone dealsâ-Animation Example :You can say âdanceâ the little guy will start dancing. Just for kickâs. -Opening Stuff : You can open most of the popular web pages, see below what you can open by default.you can sayyahoo (it will open Yahoo in a browser)google (it will open Google in a browser)sms (it will open sms in a browser)phone (it will open phone in a browser)date (it will say todayâs date)time (it will say current time)help (it will say out what it knows)-Teaching your phone to say stuff:I am thinking this is what most people will use this app for, I know that is why i use it, to make my phone say funny stuff around my friends by teaching it stuff.--Click on âTeach Meâ button and updated what you want your phone to say when you say something. Make sure to click âSaveâ before you click âBackâ to update your phoneâs brain.---Example    Type hello in the first textarea, type âhello âyour nameâ you are cool in the second textarea     click âSaveâ then âBackâ. That is it you are set. Now your phone knows about the word âhelloâ.     Try it by saying hello the phone should say back âhello âyour nameâ you are cool-RequirementsAndroid OS 2.2 and aboveRecommended for Newer Android Phones and Tablets-TestingWas Tested on Atrix 4G, Nexus HTC, Samsung Galaxy Tab, Droid. No know issues with Android 2.2 and above.-Known Issues on older phonesOlder Droid phones HTC EVO 4G and few other phones have no sound. Please get refund as soon as you start seeing issues if you have a older phone.-Work In ProgressMaps (this version defaults to San Diego (Beta))map (say anything after map it will open Google maps)direction (say anything after direction it will open Google maps)- Coming Soon   you can say, take picture, email picture, update facebook,update twitter. Any any new request    by people like you reading this :-).-Please email me if you have any issues, I will be more than happy to refund. Please do not put negative comments, This app is coded by me and not a huge team of developers etc.You purchase is much appreciated and will allow me to pay my bills.Got help from Family and Friends with the graphics and ideaâs. Thank YouNetsolvers.netEnjoy!!!!
